Major_Arcs.title: Introduction to Ghost Town and Initial Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town, the characters of Nan and Cal, and the initial conflicts surrounding the planned airport development and Nan's personal connection to the town.

sub_scenes.title: Nostalgia and Bar Scene Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the initial setting in a saloon and introduces the main characters and themes of nostalgia and conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to Ghost Town and Woman's Nostalgia
Bar Conversation and Ghost Town Disagreement

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Journey and Airport Plan Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Nan's journey to the Ghost Town and introduces the surveyors and their airport development plan, creating a central conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Solo Ride to Ghost Town
Modern Visitors and Airport Development Plan
Nan Overhears the Airport Plan and Reacts

Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Emotional Turmoil and Confrontation at Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores Nan's emotional reflections, her confrontation with construction workers, and the escalating conflict surrounding the ghost town's destruction.

sub_scenes.title: Reflection on Past Relationship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene delves into Nan's internal thoughts and past relationship with Cal, triggered by her distress over the ghost town.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Reflection on Past Relationship with Cal

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Construction Workers
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's direct and dangerous confrontation with the construction workers at the ghost town.

Major_Arcs.title: Business Discussions and Father-Daughter Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to business matters related to the airport and cattle, highlighting the growing conflict between Nan and her father over her perceived interference.

sub_scenes.title: Business Talk and Airport Opposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a business discussion about the airport's benefits and Nan's father's opposition, creating initial tension.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of Horses and Father's Disapproval

Major_Arcs.title: Conflicting Advice and Nan's Pursuit of Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan receiving conflicting advice regarding Cal and her relationship, leading to her determined pursuit of him to clarify their future.

sub_scenes.title: Conflicting Perspectives on Love and Patience
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents differing advice from Nan's mother, father, and maid, highlighting her complex emotional situation.

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Determination and Business Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan taking decisive action to confront Cal, but her personal quest is interrupted by business obligations.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Determination and Pursuit of Cal
Business Deal with Cowboys and Urgency

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with Cal and Time Skip to Loneliness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Nan's confrontation with Cal regarding their relationship and business, followed by a time skip highlighting her subsequent loneliness and regret.

sub_scenes.title: Ultimatum and Defiant Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Nan's ultimatum to Cal and his defiant decision to prioritize business over their relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Belated Confession and Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan pursuing Cal to confess her feelings, which is immediately interrupted by news of a severe weather crisis.

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the community's response to a severe snowstorm and the unexpected arrival of aid, resolving the immediate weather crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Community Concern and Urgency
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the community's concern about the cattle and the escalating weather crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Hope, Despair, and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the emotional rollercoaster of hope and despair during the snowstorm, culminating in the arrival of aerial aid.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: The Fodder Plane
Assessing the Situation and Lingering Concerns

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and the town of Juniper, exploring his forceful persona and the diverse reactions he evokes.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Forceful Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a display of force and the initial reactions of townspeople.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dangerous Casanova's Display of Force
Conflicting Views on Chane Benson's Heroism and Manners
Beyond Brute Force: Maturity and Civilization

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff, His Mother, and Chane Benson's Influence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Jeff's fascination with Chane Benson, his mother's concern, and the escalating tension surrounding guns and violence.

sub_scenes.title: Concerns about Jeff's Gun Obsession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals concerns about Jeff's unhealthy interest in guns and his hero worship.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing about Brother Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Mother's Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation between Jeff and his mother regarding gun handling and her disappointment in his behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Initiating a Talk about Jeff's Gun Handling
Mother's Disappointment and Desire for Decency
Comparison to Chane Benson and Criticism of Clyde Surrett
Defense of Chane Benson and Mocking Duel with Clyde Surrett

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Resolve and Clyde's Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the mother's determination to help Jeff and Clyde's reassurance and shared responsibility.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Shared Responsibility for Jeff's Upbringing
Affection and Hope for Future Happiness
Reflection on Blissful Ignorance and Looming Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with Benson and Unease
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Mr. Benson directly and creates a sense of unease and foreboding through the narrative voice.

narrative_arcs.title: Advice from Mr. Benson to Sally
Chane Benson's Cold Demeanor and Silent Observation
Rejection of Brother's Influence and Disdain for Young Boys

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with Benson and Clyde's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a direct confrontation with Chane Benson, Clyde's intervention, and the escalating tension in Juniper town.

sub_scenes.title: Surrett's Confrontation and Benson's Evasive Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Surrett confronting Benson and his evasive and challenging response, setting the stage for further conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Questioning of Benson's Intentions
Benson's Evasive Response and Assertion of Staying
Clyde's Intervention and Warning to Benson

sub_scenes.title: Private Concerns and Clyde's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves a private conversation between Surrett and Clyde, highlighting their concerns and Clyde's firm resolve to act.

narrative_arcs.title: Surrett's Further Inquiry and Clyde's Resolve to Stay
Clyde's Declaration of Action and Protection

Major_Arcs.title: Sally's Dinner Invitation and Jeff's Subservience to Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally's attempt to use courtesy to resolve conflict, Jeff's increasing influence by Benson, and the dinner party that escalates tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation Strategy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally and Jeff discussing Benson, leading to Sally's idea of inviting him to dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Benson and Dinner Invitation
Narrative Reflection on Decency and Courtesy
Narrative Time Skip and Jeff's Shift in Viewpoint
Dinner Shooting Demonstration and Sally's Concern

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Party Fallout and Physical Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the aftermath of the dinner party, escalating tensions, accusations, and ultimately, a physical fight between Jeff and Benson.

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Flirtation and Accusations
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the end of dinner, a flirtatious moment, and the subsequent accusations and rising tensions outdoors.

sub_scenes.title: Physical Fight and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the escalation to physical violence, Jeff's attack, and the subsequent escape plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Provocation and Jeff's Anger
Sally's Urgency and the Escape Plan

Major_Arcs.title: Jeff and Benson's Fight and Newspaper Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the agreed-upon fight between Jeff and Benson, the anxious wait, and Jeff's victory leading to Benson's departure and a hopeful future.

sub_scenes.title: Verbal Duel and Agreed Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the verbal confrontation escalating to an agreement for a physical fight without guns.

narrative_arcs.title: Headline Change and Relief at Return

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Introduction and Betsy's Firm Stance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting at a ranch and the character of Betsy, highlighting her strong will and initial conflicts related to ranch management and gunslingers.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Fight and New Hire
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes a ranch setting with a fight and introduces Steve Daley as a new hire.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and the Boss
Explanation of Steve's Hiring and Approval

sub_scenes.title: Town Trip and Ranch Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a trip to town related to ranch business and highlights underlying concerns about ranch troubles.

sub_scenes.title: Store Observation and Street Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows observations at the store and a direct street confrontation where Long Lady demonstrates her capabilities.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Decision and Romantic Development
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves Betsy's stance on gunslingers and shows the beginning of romantic feelings between Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and the Dilemma of Profession

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflict and Steve's Past
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a ranch confrontation and Steve's internal reflection on past events, hinting at deeper troubles and backstory.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation over Trespassing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a direct confrontation on the ranch over trespassing and missing cattle, escalating ranch tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Bridges and his Men

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Past Reflections
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Steve's internal thoughts, hinting at a troubled past and significant past events influencing the present.

Major_Arcs.title: Steve's Decision to Fight and Devil's Pass Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Steve's decision to resort to violence, his journey to Devil's Pass, and the ensuing violent confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Arm and Head to Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Steve's decision to arm himself and confront the threat directly at Devil's Pass, despite Betsy's pleas.

narrative_arcs.title: Steve's Decision to Arm Himself and Go to Devil's Pass
Betsy's Realization and Pursuit of Steve
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Initial Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: New Conflicts and Ranch Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces new, separate conflicts concerning Dave and Carrie, and ranch troubles related to range disputes and cattle.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave and Ranch News
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a new conflict involving a 'Dave' and introduces ranch troubles via Curley's arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubling News at the Ranch
Discussion Among Intruders and Threat of Gunplay

Major_Arcs.title: Dave and Carrie's Relationship Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on resolving the relationship conflicts between Dave and Carrie, moving from apology and reconciliation to a marriage proposal and acceptance.

sub_scenes.title: Apology and Brotherly Matters
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dave apologizing to Carrie and discussing brotherly matters, initiating reconciliation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Fred and Brotherly Matters
Carrie's Introspective Thoughts on Love and Anticipation
Intrusion and Questioning by Fred Gordon

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Marriage Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the reconciliation between Dave and Carrie, leading to a marriage proposal and joyful acceptance.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Rebuttal and Declaration of Love
Desire for Reconciliation and Invitation for Relaxation
Carrie's Reflection on Love for Fred and His Qualities
Carrie's Confession and Dave's Marriage Proposal

Major_Arcs.title: Carlton Contract Fallout and Emotional Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the fallout from the Carlton contract issue and Carrie's emotional resolution, leading to a clearer understanding of her feelings and relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Contract Confrontation and Justification
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's confrontation about the Carlton contract and her justification for her actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Deception and Plea of Love
Confrontation with Dave, Pete, and Fred

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Fred's Reunion and Dirk's Injury
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Carrie and Fred's emotional reunion, contrasted with the sudden arrival and injured state of Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Fred's Pain and Carrie's Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Fred's internal pain and transitions to Carrie's confession of love and emotional reunion with Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Chance Encounter and Emotional Inquiry in Town
Young Man's Confession and Carrie's Initial Reaction
Carrie's Flashback of Shame, Regret, and Happiness

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Crime and Rance and Chris's Reconciliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on revealing Dirk's crime, the negotiation for his custody, and Rance and Chris's final reconciliation and engagement.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Crime and Negotiation for Custody
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Dirk's crime and the initial steps in negotiating his custody with the law.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance Cready's Arrival and Initial Encounter with Chris Ransome
Escalating Tension and Accusation at the Ranch
Negotiation for Dirk's Custody and Care
Lawman's Internal Conflict and Shifting Perspective

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confessions and Engagement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the romantic confessions between Chris and Rance, leading to their engagement and a happy resolution for their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Expression of Desire and Lingering Doubt
Realization of Rejection and Internal Conflict
Confrontation about Intentions and Daybreak Departure

Major_Arcs.title: The Chase and Final Wedding Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the story with the chase after Dirk, the final confrontation, and the resolution at Chris and Rance's wedding.

sub_scenes.title: The Pursuit and Shootout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the escalating chase after Dirk, culminating in a violent shootout.

narrative_arcs.title: Justification for Deadly Force and Injury Assessment
Desperate Escape Plan and Moral Objection
Parting Ways and Confession of Love
Confession of Sleepless Vigil and Lingering Danger
Father's Tactful Exit and Anticipation of Private Discussion
Clarification of Father's Integrity and Dirk's Involvement
Declaration of Gratitude and Undying Affection
Acclamation and Anecdotal Praise for Rance
